v8:item.v8:content: Company bank account for which a receipt is issued
Document transaction type: payment or tax transfer
Specifies kind of payment: electronically, by mail, by telegraph, urgently
Code of the budget classification of RF revenues
OKTMO - code of the territory (settlement) where assets are mobilized
Reason code registration of payment recipient
The payment purpose text. Shown in the relative field of the document print form
Company under the name of which the payment order is issued
Document date - reasons for tax, fee or other payment transaction
Document number - reasons for tax, fee or other payment transaction
Conditional indicator of the basis of the tax payment
Conditional indicator of the period for which the tax is transferred
Conditional indicator of the type of the tax payment
Status of the Payment Document's Author
Author status of the Payment document for tax transfer, collections and other obligatory payment
Payer name. Shown in the relative field of the document print form
Payment recipient name. Shown in the relative field of the document print form
